flow-definition.description:
Disk Cleanup Script

This executes a shell command on Jenkins on delta01 which removes all but the latest 15 builds ( each build has 3 directories ) from /scratch/jenkins/archived-builds/federation-master-FPGATest-Run-VC707

Feel free click on "Configure" to the left and modify the bottom part of the script to work on any machine and execute any command, but please put it back how you found it and comment any additions/etc.
